body.description: This Projector Do not Come with Projector SCREENWhy Choose Our Projector? 1.40% Brightness Improved Thanks primarily to the 2022 upgraded tech, this mini projector delivers a +40% brightness better. The color and brightness are both upgraded which will allow you to enjoy a superior watching experience. 2.Mini projector with 720P Native Resolution In order to provide you with a better viewing experience, we are constantly improving our products to ensure that our mini projectors are real 720P, unlike other projector, they may be real 480P or 260P. 3.Enhanced Color Contrast Ratio This video projector is also designed with the latest NTSC color technology and has improved the color contrast ratio to 5000:1 to restore the real color content, which presents our customers with a real, dynamic and color vibrant projection image quality. 4.Plug & Play The projector enables to connect TV Stick / Laptop / DVD / PS3 / Xbox / TV box via HDMI input; Connect to PC via VGA jack; Connect TV/ video devices via AV input; Connect with iPhone, an extra Lightning to HDMI adapter is needed (not included). When connect with android phone, you need an extra Micro USB/ Type C to HDMI adapter (not included). 5.Big Screen Experience The projection size varies from 32'' to 176''. The projection distance between 1m and 5m. Adjust the keystone correction to make the image rectangle. Adjust the Focus Wheel to make it clear. What Can We do with Our Mini Projector? If your child wants to watch cartoons, you can start a cartoon journey at home right away without the long drive to the cinema. If your wife wants to watch a romantic movie, you can start a romantic journey at home right away. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, light, and a great value
reviews.reviewText: I own a larger projector model from this same manufacturer for over a year and it has served me well. Therefore, I had no hesitation in buying from this company again when I was in the market for a smaller and more portable projector. And this model is much smaller and lighter. Despite that the performance is just as impressive. The package includes both RCA and HDMI cables, a remote, a cleaning kit, and a screen. The only thing you will need are two AAA batteries for the remote. It was easy to setup. Just plug it into the laptop, turn it on, and adjust the focus. The picture was remarkable for such a small and economical device. Even when I projected it on the wall next to a window the picture was acceptable (see pictures). And in the dark it was outstanding. It also has a built in speaker which is helpful since the laptop speaker is not all that powerful. Overall, this is a very nice projector at a very good price. I can see it being useful for demonstrations and presentations. In fact, I plan to bring it on my next road trip and use it to watch streamed movies. That will be much better than sitting in the hotel and squinting at the screen of my laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little projector!
reviews.reviewText: We recently purchased a Model HI-04 Digital Mini Projector from Dr.J Professional. As a matter of background, we had been using a Dr.J Model AK-30 Full Size Digital Projector for general “Theater” usage. We have been pleased with performance of this full-size projector, and offer the following thoughts on Dr.J’s Mini Model:It’s small size allows more options for discrete in-home mounting opportunities. Also, it is more convenient to use for business and travel purposes. It’s small size is easy to pack.While in a smaller package, video quality is superior to our current full-size projector in terms of brightness, color, and clarity. Our typical placement is 10’ from the screen. At this distance, it provides a crisp 8’ X 4’ image (Approx.).Set-up instructions are simple. If you have a Smart Phone or TV, you will be quickly up and running.The only downside is in over-all audio performance. The small speaker sounds tinny and it detracts from a theater-like experience. We connected our mini projector to an inexpensive Dell computer speaker system, and sound was greatly improved. Audio performance of the basic unit should not be an issue if you plan to use this mini-projector for Power-Point type presentations and the like.Overall, I’d rate the Dr.J HI-40 Mini Projector as a recommended “Buy” for the money.

Audio is like a phone audio, maybe a little worse. Super quiet and I tried to connect a small speaker to it but barley made q difference.
